amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the non-defense Environmental Cleanup account by $36 million and reduces funds for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Departmental Administration by $18 million and reduces funds for the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation Office of the Administrator by $18 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Non-defense Environmental Cleanup account by $36 million by decreasing funds from the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Departmental Administration and Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation Office of the Administrator.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 195 (Roll no. 330).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 195 (Roll no. 330).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Reed.
